recipe.title: Feta, Garbanzo Bean, and Eggplant Pita Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 pound Japanese eggplants, unpeeled, cut into 3/4-inch cubes
1 15 1/2-ounce can garbanzo beans, drained, 1/2 cup juices reserved
3 pita bread rounds, warmed in oven or toasted
instructions: Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggplant cubes and onions; sauté until soft and beginning to brown, about 9 minutes. Stir in garbanzo beans, cumin, and lemon juice. Sauté until heated through and flavors blend, adding enough garbanzo bean liquid by tablespoonfuls to moisten if mixture is dry, about 4 minutes. Stir in 3 tablespoons mint and 3 tablespoons feta cheese. Season generously with salt and pepper.
Cut pita breads crosswise in half. Spoon eggplant mixture into pita breads. Sprinkle filling with remaining mint and feta and serve.
